mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(ID, PASSWORD, NAME, YEAR, MONTH, DAY, PHONNUM, LOCATION, EMAIL, JOINDATE, PROFILE_IMG) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{phonnum}, #{location}, #{email}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{profile_img})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(count(*), 0) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
